member.name: T:WebApi.Controllers.TransactionsController
member.summary: Provides endpoints for managing and retrieving transaction data.
member.remarks: The TransactionsController class handles HTTP requests related to transaction processing, including uploading CNAB files, retrieving transactions by store, fetching store balances, and listing all store names. It utilizes asynchronous operations to interact with the transaction service and logs critical errors during processing.
